name: following_by_username
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_pro.
Tool description: Insatgram API Pro Version
API description: Retrieve the list of users that the specified Instagram user is following, up to 1000 records.

username.description: The Instagram username for which to retrieve the following list.

corsenabled.description: Whether CORS is enabled. Defaults to None.

nextmaxid.description: The next maximum ID for pagination. Defaults to None.
